resources.string: Sure to stop monitoring this address?
Can not monitor address with too much TXs
Can not monitor special MultiSig address
Service data is too old ,Please wait
You have no coins to send
No transactions found for this address, it has probably not been used on the network yet.
Cannot monitor address with large amount of transactions.
Cannot monitor address with large amount of transactions.
Cannot monitor address with special transactions.
You can only stop monitoring one address in a minute.
You can only remonitor one address in a minute.
This Bither Cold is already monitored.
Loading wallets, Please try again later.
Bither can only monitor Bither Cold monitor QR code,\nnot other addresses.
Send failed. Sending coins this few will be ignored.
Send failed. %s BTC to be confirmed.\nPlease wait for another confirmation.
Send failed. Transaction size is to large.\nPlease reduce amount.
You have outputs lower than 0.01BTC,\nand transaction fee is low.\nConfirmation may be very slow.
Give up signing?\nThis transaction will not get broadcasted.
High end can\'t be lower than current price.
Low end can\'t be higher than current price.
Sure to set low transaction fee as default?\nThis may cause slow confirmation.
The last backup is within 1 hour. Sure to backup again?
Confirm to export logs to sdcard ?
From Bither Private Key QR Code
From HDM Cold Seed QR Code
From HD Account Seed QR Code
Not match HDM cod seed format
Not match HD Account seed format
Can not import HDM Cold Seed
Scan HDM Cold Seed QR Code
Import failed. This account is already in Bither.
Can\'t import Bither Cold private key.
Password of the private key to import is different from ours. Import failed.
Cannot import private key with large amount of transactions.
Cannot import private key with special transactions.

Reload Transactions data?
Need long time.
Consume network data.
Recommand trying only with wrong data.
Reload transactions data failed , Please retry again.
You can only reload transactions data in a hour..
Got invalid bitcoin address!\n(Mixing up Mainnet/Testnet?)
Once mode is set, it can\'t be changed.\nBither Cold need to be run on a offline phone.\nSet this phone as Bither Cold?
Once mode is set, it can\'t be changed.\nBither Hot is an online bitcoin wallet.\nSet this phone as Bither Hot?
You don\'t have any private key, please add some
QR Code contains no bitcoin address
Scan QR code No.1 provided by Bither
Scan with Bither Hot to sign transaction.
Scan QR Code on Bither Hot
Scan by the clone destination to clone
Scan with Bither Hot to watch Bither Cold
SD card failure, Can not backup
Reached watch only address count limit
How many private keys to generate?
Find previous back up of Bither Cold on SD card. Recover from it?
Would you check your private keys now?
Scan with Bither Cold to sign transaction
Scan QR Code on Bither Cold
Scan Qr Code to watch Bither Cold
Current system time is wrong, please correct it.
Only supports the compressed format of private key
old version QR Code does not support change address selection
You don\'t have any address with enough available bitcoin
New password is same to the old.
Changing password…\nDo Not turn off the screen.

Upgrading...
1.Do not exit Bither.
2.Do not turn off the phone.
3.Do not turn off the screen.
Your device can\'t provide enough secured randomness.
You have generated %d private keys from XRandom.
XRandom gathers data from sources to improve randomness.\n\nThe sources are sensors on your device like camera, microphone, magnetic sensor, gravity sensor, etc.
\n\nShaking or rotating your device and make some noise while gathering can improve randomness.
Switched to old version QR Codes, sign with Bither Cold <1.1.0
Switched to new version QR Codes, sign with Bither Cold ≧1.1.0
You have no address to check r-value.
Duplicated r values in an address\' transaction history might result in exposing the private key.\n\nRCheck will check all the r values in history to make sure no duplicated found.
This address still has some bitcoin.\nYou can\'t move it to trash can.
Enter your new PIN code again
New PIN codes are not same

Set this phone as Bither Cold?

Bither Cold need to be run on a offline phone.
You can monitor Bither Cold by Bither Hot.
Once set you can't switch back.
This private key is not safe
Pay to address & change address can\'t be same
You can only have 1 HDM account

HDM is the hybrid of Hierarchical Deterministic & Multisig technics.

HDM uses Multisig to avoid HD wallet's vulnerability.

Bither uses 2 of 3 Multisig for HDM.

The 3 keys are generated from 3 HD seeds by Bither Hot, Bither Cold & HDM server.
You have generated 1 HDM account from XRandom.
Scan HDM Cold Account QR Code
Choose HDM Server QR Code on Bither Cold
Signing server QR code is wrong
HDM Cold account is already bound to another Hot account
You can\'t trash all the addresses in an HDM account
How many HDM addresses to add?
Need HDM Cold account QR code to continue.
HDM Cold account is not same as before
You don\'t have the requested HDM Cold account
Send bitcoins from HDM recovery account to other addresses ASAP
HDM Server authentication failed.\nUse HDM Cold to reauthorize?
HDM Cold seed is very important.\nYou must save it by yourself.
I have saved my HDM Cold seed.

Singular Mode runs on one device.
Do not need Bither Cold.
But you need to keep Cold seed safely.
Cold seed is the only way to recover.
HDM singular mode can not be interrupted.
Sure to turn off password strength check?
You already have an HD account.
HD seed can be used to recover HD account.\nPlease keep it somewhere safe.
Unused new address count is limited to 20.
Add a Seed to Make an Enterprise HDM Account
Not match enterprise HDM seed format
From HD Account Seed QR Code
You can only monitor 1 cold HD account
Monitor failed. This account is already in Bither.
Normal private keys are not within HD Account.\nThey need separated back ups.
You need to upgrade Bither cold to v1.6.0
Please firstly sync to block no %d
Please wait. The transaction has been not synced well！
Failed to get BCD block height hash!
Please select the address corresponding to the import private key
Select address to detect BCC assets
This address has %1$s%2$s, extract your Bitpie account?
No other assets were found on the block browser for this address
After the opening of the default use of segwit address, confirm the opening?
After switching the default use %s address, confirm the switch?
Please never send bbc to this address, otherwise the bbc can\'t be found back！
Segwit Address only support HD Account open
